The role of a board member: such as Devon Archer and Hunter Biden, is different from that of a "boss" or "executive" as claimed by President Trump. Board members are typically not involved in the day-to-day operations of a company.
While Joe Biden was vice president: his son and Devon Archer pursued business with international entities, which raised concerns about potential political influence and protection, according to the New York Times.
